display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Native OS Window
800x600, resizable
Embeds WebView
tauri-plugin-log

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
React Components
Landing, Login, Register
Vault, Settings, PwdGen
━━━━━━━━━━━━
Radix UI + shadcn/ui
Tailwind CSS v4
Lucide icons
Framer Motion

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
React Router DOM v7
━━━━━━━━━━━━
/ → Landing
/login → Login
/register → Register
/vault → Vault
/settings → Settings

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
React Hooks
━━━━━━━━━━━━
In-Memory:
• entries: VaultEntry
• masterPassword: string
• isLocked: boolean
━━━━━━━━━━━━
localStorage:
• session_token
• theme

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Web Crypto API
━━━━━━━━━━━━
encryptVault
• PBKDF2 100k iter
• AES-256-GCM
━━━━━━━━━━━━
decryptVault
generatePassword

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
fetch API
━━━━━━━━━━━━
Base: localhost:3000/api/v1
━━━━━━━━━━━━
registerUser
loginUser
getVault
updateVault
changePassword

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Auth Middleware
AuthUser extractor
━━━━━━━━━━━━
• Extract Bearer token
• Validate vs sessions
• Check expiry & status
• Update last_activity

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
PUBLIC ROUTES:
POST /auth/register
POST /auth/login
GET /health
━━━━━━━━━━━━
PROTECTED ROUTES:
GET /vault/
PUT /vault/
POST /auth/change-password

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Argon2 Hasher
━━━━━━━━━━━━
Argon2id default
Random salt generation
PHC string format
Password verification

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
sqlx
━━━━━━━━━━━━
PgPool max 5 connections
Parameterized queries
Async PostgreSQL driver

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
users table
━━━━━━━━━━━━
id, email, srp_verifier
encrypted_vault, created_at
last_login, account_status
━━━━━━━━━━━━
sessions table
━━━━━━━━━━━━
id, user_id, session_token
created_at, expires_at
last_activity
